  • Method Details

    • calculatePriceType

      public double calculatePriceType(Enumerators.Day day, Enumerators.MovieType movieType, Enumerators.CinemaClass cinemaClass, Enumerators.Age age)
      It Calculates the price of a showing ticket according to the current type of Day, movieType, cinemaClass and Age category. Regular 2D MovieType is taken as the base price, while additional fees added onto the base price depending on the type of movie, class of cinema, age of movie-goer and day of the week/public holiday.
      Parameters:
      day - The type of day as in, whether it is a Weekday, Weekend or a Holiday.
      movieType - The type of movie as in whether it is a Regular 2D, Blockbuster 3D etc.
      cinemaClass - The class of cinema as in whether it is a Platinum, Gold or Standard.
      age - The Age category of the MovieGoer.
      Returns:
      price The calculated price of the movie ticket.

    • updatePriceType

      public void updatePriceType(PriceType priceType, double price)
      It updates the price in Price database of a given class that implements PriceType that determines the calculated price of a ticket.
      Parameters:
      priceType - It is selected class that implements PriceType
      price - The corresponding price of the ticket

    • getPriceList

      public Map<PriceType,Double> getPriceList()
      Gets all the classes implementing PriceType and their corresponding prices that determine the calculated price of a ticket.
      Returns:
      priceMaps The total calculated price of the ticket
